Articles.Content:
Mission Challenge: 

Build an Interplanetary Ship that can go until Jool,

Use it to Drop 1 Ship on each planet Sun - Jool, also the moons, that needs to land, an perform atleast 1 Science Experiement!

Manned!

 

Im trying now for 3 Hours and i still havent managed to do this!

Mods are allowed as long they are:

1. Ballanced //Well...

2. No Warp Drives etc.

3. no Supply Systems ONLY for Building //i think you need to assemble this in orbit,

 

The Drop Ships for each Planet dont have to be the same, also on planets you cant land you dont have too... (Jool, Sun, etc.)

 

Have Fun HurricanKai

Edited March 17, 2017 by HurricanKai

Check the Challenge Submission Guide. This challenge is lacking in guidelines and the few guidelines that it does have are not clear.

Edited March 17, 2017 by eloquentJane
